articles.title: Suntory Enters the Gin Market with New Distillery
articles.author: Omar El Sayed
articles.summary: Suntory is entering the gin market with a dedicated distillery in Osaka, Japan, focusing on Japanese botanicals like yuzu and sansho pepper. The company is expected to offer a range of gins, including a traditional dry gin, a Japanese botanical gin, limited editions, and pre-mixed cocktails.

articles.title: This is Microsoft's canceled Windows-based Surface Duo — the dual-screen Windows Phone from 2018 that we never got
articles.author: Zac Bowden
articles.summary: Microsoft's 'Andromeda' project, a dual-screen Windows phone prototype, was scrapped and later recycled into the Surface Duo. The Andromeda device featured design elements like a back camera, wireless charging for the pen, and a metal frame, which were omitted in the initial Surface Duo release. The device ran a custom version of Windows built for the dual-screen form factor, which also was never finalized.

articles.title: 50 Products You Won't Just "Normal" Like, You'll *Reallllllllyyyy* Like
articles.author: Mallory Mower
articles.summary: The article features new product introductions across various categories. Sol de Janeiro launched Brazilian Bum Bum Cream. Cerave introduced Eye Repair Cream with ceramides, hyaluronic acid, and niacinamide. COSRX unveiled Snail Mucin Repairing Essence. Lee Beauty released Extra Strength Callus Remover.

articles.title: PHOTO GALLERY: Chick-fil-A opens to hungry public this week in Williamsport
articles.author: Brett Crossley
articles.summary: Chick-fil-A opened its first store in Williamsport, Pennsylvania, on Maynard Street. The opening included goodie bags and prizes for customers. The owner, Ryan Braundmeier, expressed enthusiasm for bringing the restaurant's service to the community.

articles.title: Show HN: NameFast – Generate names for your SaaS idea in seconds
articles.summary: Namefast has launched a tool to help users find creative and available names for SaaS, startups, or side projects. The tool generates short, brandable, and domain-available name ideas based on a one-sentence description of the user's idea.

articles.title: "This Changes How You Poop Forever" as This Revolutionary Toilet Paper Breakthrough Redefines How Billions Clean Themselves Every Day
articles.author: Avi Cohen
articles.summary: Charmin introduced a new Smooth Tear wavy perforation design for their toilet paper, resulting in a 5% increase in business and enhanced user satisfaction. This innovation addresses the issue of uneven tearing and represents an incremental improvement in a common household product. Procter & Gamble invested years in research to develop the optimal design.

articles.title: Spider-Man: Brand New Day's Tom Holland Costume Reveal Is A Serious Upgrade
articles.author: Forbes
articles.summary: Marvel revealed Tom Holland's new Spider-Man suit. The new suit from the upcoming Spider-Man: Brand New Day is a significant upgrade from past versions.

articles.title: 53 Affordable Versions Of More Expensive Products
articles.author: Elizabeth Lilly
articles.summary: Nortiv 8 introduced walking shoes with a comfortable design at an affordable price. Gold Bond launched firming neck and chest cream with hydrating and exfoliating properties. Essence introduced Drop of Sunshine Bronzing Drops as a budget-friendly alternative to Drunk Elephant.

articles.title: Aldi's $4 Rich and Versatile Spread Is a Game-Changer for At-Home Baking
articles.author: Nathan Hutsenpiller
articles.summary: Aldi introduced Benton's Speculoos Cookie Butter, a dupe of Trader Joe's Speculoos Cookie Butter, available in crunchy and creamy variations for a limited time. This spreadable treat can be used in various baking applications and as a topping or dip.

articles.title: Tom Holland Just Gave Us a Proper Look at the ‘Brand New Day' Spider Suit
articles.author: Gizmodo
articles.summary: Tom Holland unveiled the new Spider-Man suit for the upcoming 2026 movie, 'Spider-Man: Brand New Day', commemorating Spider-Man Day. The new suit will be featured in the movie.

articles.title: Samsung Addresses Past Issues With Previous Models With The Galaxy Z Fold7
articles.summary: Samsung has launched the Galaxy Z Fold7, a foldable smartphone featuring improvements such as a slimmer design, enhanced screen, 200-megapixel primary lens camera system and One UI 8 software. The Galaxy Z Fold7 is available now for $1,999.

articles.title: Tom Holland debuts new Spider-Man suit in Brand New Day; Fans say ‘prayed for…'
articles.author: Ht Us Desk
articles.summary: Tom Holland revealed a redesigned Spider-Man suit for the upcoming movie, Spider-Man: Brand New Day. The new suit features bolder red and blue tones, and a larger spider insignia, closely resembling the classic comic book version. The movie is set to release on July 31, 2026.

articles.title: Morrisons announces change to some everyday items this week
articles.author: Molly Court
articles.summary: Morrisons is introducing new yellow promotional packaging online from August 4 for hundreds of everyday products, including Innocent Orange Juice, Pampers Nappies, and Soreen Malt Loaf. This initiative, also launched in shops, aims to raise £15 million for Marie Curie by October 2027, with a percentage of each 'Every Pack Gives Back' product sale being donated. Specific items such as Morrisons food-to-go sandwiches, London Essence Indian Tonic Water and MOJU Ginger Vitality Dosing Bottle Shots will feature a special 'Every Pack Gives Back' design.

articles.title: The Sage Luxe Brewer Thermal is so good, I might never use my trusty V60 coffee dripper again
articles.author: Cat Ellis
articles.summary: Sage, known as Breville in some regions, offers the Luxe Brewer Thermal, a compact drip coffee machine. It features an insulated carafe that keeps coffee hot for hours, a delayed start timer, customizable brew settings, and a removable water tank. The machine is supplied with flat-bottomed and cone-shaped filters for different batch sizes.

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy S24 Ultra Price Now Slashed By $500 In New Sale
articles.author: Forbes
articles.summary: Samsung's Galaxy S24 Ultra, featuring Galaxy AI, is now available at a lower price point.

articles.title: Humanoid robot strolls NYC, tries on sneakers and freaks out New Yorkers
articles.author: New York Post
articles.summary: KOID launched a promotional stunt in Midtown New York featuring a humanoid robot. The KOID-branded bot, whose price wasn't mentioned, garnered viral attention by performing everyday activities.

articles.title: 32 Beauty Products So Amazing A Wizard Must've Cast A Spell
articles.author: Jessica Hall
articles.summary: The article highlights the introduction of various new beauty and skincare products.  Elizabeth Mott's Thank Me Later Eye Primer and Urban Decay All Nighter Setting Spray are introduced for long-lasting makeup.  Several products like Blume's Meltdown Acne Oil, E.l.f. putty primer, Juno & Co.'s Clean 10 Cleansing Balm, Essence's Lash Princess mascara, Dr. Jart+ Color-Correcting Treatment, Maybelline multi-use concealer, L'Oréal Paris Infallible Fresh Powder Foundation, Honeyskin Ultimate Face and Body cream, BYO Blush Oil, First Aid Beauty's KP Bump Eraser Body Scrub Exfoliant and L'Oréal Paris Elvive 8 Second Wonder Water are also featured for their unique benefits and features.

articles.title: Morrisons announces change to some everyday items this week
articles.author: Molly Court
articles.summary: Morrisons has introduced 'Every Pack Gives Back' products featuring special packaging to raise money for Marie Curie. Additionally, Morrisons has started using cleaning robots in its stores, which use AI and computer vision to navigate and clean.

articles.title: Morrisons confirms change to these products this week (for an important reason)
articles.author: Molly Court
articles.summary: Morrisons is introducing new yellow promotional packaging online and in shops for hundreds of everyday products. Additionally, Morrisons has introduced cleaning robots in some stores, using AI and computer vision technology to keep the floors clean.

articles.title: 37 Things To Make Your Life Easier If You Live Solo
articles.author: Elizabeth Lilly
articles.summary: Just Spices offers a starter set with eight spice blends. Velveeta provides a three-pack of cheese sauce for quick meals. Dash features a mini rice cooker for versatile cooking. Hungryroot provides grocery delivery with 10-minute recipes.

articles.title: Inoxoft Launches WhiteLightning: Lightweight, Offline AI Text Classifier for Edge Devices
articles.author: Timothy Alexander
articles.summary: Inoxoft has launched WhiteLightning, a new open-source command-line interface (CLI) tool designed for fast, efficient, and offline text classification on edge devices. The tool, built using a teacher-student distillation process, allows developers to utilize NLP without cloud dependencies, offering a compact and privacy-safe alternative to cloud-based NLP tools.

articles.title: Hollow Knight: Silksong - The Story Behind the Insanely Long Wait For a Game We Demoed in 2019
articles.author: Matt Kim
articles.summary: Team Cherry initially planned Hollow Knight: Silksong as DLC for Hollow Knight, following a successful Kickstarter campaign in 2014. However, on February 14, 2019, Hollow Knight: Silksong was officially announced as a sequel, after the expansion of hollow knight

articles.title: Spider-Man 4: Brand New Day's Suit Finally Revealed by Tom Holland
articles.author: Paul Tamburro
articles.summary: Sony Pictures Entertainment revealed the new Spider-Man suit for 'Spider-Man: Brand New Day' through a video featuring Tom Holland. The costume, a departure from previous MCU suits, reflects a return to basics for Peter Parker and shares similarities with earlier Spider-Man suits. 'Spider-Man: Brand New Day' is scheduled for release on July 31, 2026.

articles.title: Adidas releases 2025 NCAA team adizero Evo SL running shoes, how to buy
articles.author: Dylan Reffe
articles.summary: Adidas is launching 13 new NCAA team sneakers in two releases, with the first seven pairs of adizero Evo SL model available now. These shoes are designed for training, racing, and showing team support, built to be breathable, durable, lightweight and dynamic.

articles.title: Brains, Beauty & Burnout: Here's Why MG Cyberster Could Be A Wisest Wildcard In Sports Car Segment
articles.author: Shahrukh Shah
articles.summary: JSW MG Motor has launched the MG Cyberster, a two-door electric sports car, in India with a starting price of Rs 75 lakh. The Cyberster boasts a dual-motor AWD 77kWh battery pack, producing 503 bhp and reaching 0-100 kmph in 3.2 seconds, and offers a range of up to 580km on a single charge.

articles.title: This Frozen Pizza Is So Good I Ate It Three Nights In A Row
articles.author: Alana Al-Hatlani
articles.summary: Screamin' Sicilian offers frozen pizzas with generous toppings, a flavorful tomato sauce base, and a fluffy crust. The 'Supremus Maximus' pizza includes mozzarella, Italian sausage, pepperoni, peppers, onions, and olives. It is available at stores like Publix.

articles.title: The new Blink Video Doorbell is one of the simplest and most affordable models around
articles.author: Spencer Hart
articles.summary: Blink announced the second-generation Blink Video Doorbell, priced under $60, featuring a 150° field of view, night vision, and optional person detection with a Blink subscription. It will start shipping mid-August and is available for pre-order at $59.99 in the US and £49.99 in the UK.

articles.title: Enhanced Search, Story Albums, and Rating System Improve User Experience
articles.author: Omar El Sayed
articles.summary: Archyde.com introduced enhanced search functionality leveraging semantic search and faceted search, story albums for thematic content grouping, and a new rating system to improve user experience. These updates aim to improve content discoverability, increase user engagement, and incentivize the creation of valuable content. The 'Remote Work Revolution' album resulted in a 70% increase in overall views and a rise in social shares.

articles.title: 29 Must-Haves You'll Want On Your Deep Clean Days
articles.author: Lily Burrill
articles.summary: Bioclean introduces a hard water stain remover for glass doors, faucets, and shower heads. EasyWring launches a microfiber spin mop with an extendable handle and hands-free wringing. Affresh releases dishwasher tablets that clean dishwashers during a normal wash cycle. Bissell releases Little Green, which works ✨wonders✨ on your couches, carpets, and other upholstery items since it literally sucks up dirt, stubborn stains, and any other nasty spills that have worked their way into your life.

articles.title: Aldi's £2.99 Middle Aisle essential will leave your car sparkling without any smears – plus it smells lush
articles.author: Henna Sharma
articles.summary: Aldi is selling Ride & Go Cherry Scented Screen Wash for £2.99. Aldi also offers Lacura marine oil for £3.99 and Lacura Illuminate Setting Spray, both positioned as budget-friendly alternatives to Elemis and Charlotte Tilbury products, respectively. These Specialbuys are launched every Thursday and Sunday.

articles.title: Aldi's £2.99 Middle Aisle essential will leave your car sparkling without any smears – plus it smells lush
articles.author: Henna Sharma
articles.summary: Aldi introduced the Ride & Go Cherry Scented Screen Wash, a £2.99 car cleaning product that leaves a sweet cherry scent. Also, Aldi launched Lacura Illuminate Setting Spray and Lacura marine oil for beauty dupes, offering budget-friendly alternatives to high-end brands.

articles.title: Aldi's £2.99 Middle Aisle essential will leave your car sparkling without any smears – plus it smells lush
articles.author: Henna Sharma
articles.summary: Aldi has launched Ride & Go Cherry Scented Screen Wash for £2.99. Aldi also launched other Specialbuys including a high-speed blender for £14.99 and Lacura Illuminate Setting Spray, a dupe of Charlotte Tilbury's setting spray.

articles.title: TECNO Launches Creators Hub with Over 2,000 Nigerian Student Content Creators
articles.author: Daily Trust
articles.summary: TECNO has launched the Creators Hub, a new initiative aimed at empowering over 2,000 student content creators in Nigerian universities. This initiative is part of the campaign for TECNO's latest smartphone, the TECNO SPARK 40 Series.

articles.title: The One Nutella Alternative We Didn't Want To Stop Eating
articles.author: Mathieson Nishimura
articles.summary: Walmart's Great Value Hazelnut Spread is introduced as a cheaper alternative to Nutella. It is praised for its similar smooth texture and close-to-original chocolate and hazelnut taste. The product is available for less than $5 for a 26.5-ounce jar.

articles.title: "We want AWS to be the place where everyone runs enterprise AI agents" - the agentic era is here for your business, so be prepared for the new age
articles.author: Mike Moore
articles.summary: Amazon Web Services (AWS) launched Amazon Bedrock AgentCore, a new platform designed to support the next generation of AI agents. This platform provides developers with the tools to create and deploy advanced AI agents, aiming to simplify the process of building and running AI agents at scale.

articles.title: Gmail's New Feature Lets You Clean Up Your Inbox in a Couple of Taps
articles.author: Blake Stimac
articles.summary: Gmail introduced a new feature that centralizes newsletter subscriptions, enabling users to easily view and bulk unsubscribe from multiple newsletters. This update simplifies decluttering unnecessary emails.

articles.title: Your Favourite Ice Cream Just Got a Stick Makeover—Meet Ferro &; Crunchy Munchy by Cream Stone Ice Cream This Friendship Day
articles.author: PTI
articles.summary: Cream Stone Ice Cream launched its first premium ice cream stick collection, introducing two new variants: Ferro and Crunchy Munchy. The launch occurred nationally on August 3, 2025 (Friendship Day), and the new products are available across all Cream Stone Ice Cream outlets in India. This launch signifies Cream Stone Ice Cream's expansion into the frozen novelties market.

articles.title: ‘My Grandma Cleared My Acne in Just Four Days with a Mystery Cream'
articles.author: Internewscast
articles.summary: 47 Skin launched a skincare range featuring Silver Chitoderm, an ingredient that eliminates bacteria responsible for spots. The product line includes items like the Anti-Blemish and Scar Repair Everyday Cleanser, Anti-Blemish and Scar Repair Silver Mask, Anti-Blemish and Scar Repair Serum, and Anti-Blemish and Scar Repair Daily Moisturiser, with prices ranging from £24 to £34. Early customer reviews indicate positive results.

articles.title: Sony teases new Spider-Man suit for Tom Holland in 2026's ‘Brand New Day'
articles.summary: Sony Pictures has teased Tom Holland's new Spider-Man suit for the upcoming Spider-Man: Brand New Day. The teaser offers a first glimpse of the updated costume ahead of the film's release. Filming will use real-world locations, with production set to begin in Glasgow.

articles.title: 33 Beauty Products So Good You'll Want To Tell *Everyone* About Them
articles.author: Negesti Kaudo
articles.summary: Numerous companies are introducing new beauty and personal care products. Sol De Janeiro launches a body cream, while Beauty of Joseon introduces an eye serum. Additionally, L'Oreal releases an eight-second lamellar water rinse-out treatment for hair, and Kosas presents the Revealer Concealer.

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy Z Flip 7 review: Less flash, more function
articles.author: Saskia Kemsley
articles.summary: Samsung is introducing the Galaxy Z Flip 7, a high-tech flip phone with a 6.9-inch Dynamic AMOLED 2X display and a 4.1-inch FlexWindow. Powered by Samsung's Exynos 2500 (or Snapdragon 8 Gen 3), it features 12GB RAM and up to 1TB of storage.

articles.title: SwitchBot Lock Ultra and Keypad Vision review – smart and secure, but flawed
articles.author: Gareth Butterfield
articles.summary: SwitchBot has launched the SwitchBot Lock Ultra, a smart lock with improvements over its predecessor, including a faster and quieter locking mechanism, a more compact design, and a built-in lithium battery. Accompanying the Lock Ultra is the Keypad Vision, which incorporates facial recognition technology for hands-free unlocking, along with features from the previous Keypad Touch like number combination, NFC card, and fingerprint access.

articles.title: Generative AI: Stories from New Zealand's Retail Landscape
articles.author: Sophie Lin
articles.summary: Farmers, a New Zealand department store, piloted an AI styling assistant that generates personalized outfit recommendations based on uploaded photos or style preferences. This resulted in a 15% increase in average order value. New Zealand retail sector is undergoing conversion fuelled by generative AI.

articles.title: You've heard of AI 'Deep Research' tools…now Manus is launching 'Wide Research' that spins up 100+ agents to scour the web for you
articles.author: Carl Franzen
articles.summary: Manus, an AI startup, has announced the launch of "Wide Research," a new experimental feature. This feature allows users to leverage parallelized AI agents for large-scale tasks, demonstrated by comparing 100 sneakers. The result is a sortable matrix delivered in spreadsheet and webpage formats.

articles.title: Amazon DocumentDB Serverless database looks to accelerate agentic AI, cut costs
articles.author: Sean Michael Kerner
articles.summary: Amazon Web Services (AWS) has announced the general availability of Amazon DocumentDB Serverless, which brings automatic scaling to MongoDB-compatible document databases. This new offering is designed to cater to the unpredictable demand scenarios driven by AI agents, providing an economically compelling alternative to traditional database-as-a-service models.

articles.title: 'I clean with Shark's answer to a steam mop - it's hundreds cheaper than Dyson'
articles.author: Harriet Morphy-Morris
articles.summary: The Shark Kick n' Flip Automatic Steam Mop utilizes hot steam for cleaning, eliminating the need for chemical products. Its 'kick n' flip' feature allows users to target specific stains. Customer feedback praises its steam sprayer, while some mention issues with the cord length and water tank size.

articles.title: New Liverpool kits 2025/26: Where to buy as orders open
articles.author: Stephen Hurrell
articles.summary: Adidas has launched the new Liverpool 2025/26 home kit on August 1st, priced at £119.99. Liverpool delayed the launch to end its previous contract with Nike. The launch also includes overhauling official club stores to showcase the new Adidas shirts.

articles.title: My clever new fridge saves me hundreds on food AND electricity bills – it even has a cool Ring doorbell perk
articles.author: Assistant Technology
articles.summary: Samsung has released the 621L Bespoke AI Series 9 Side-by-Side Fridge Freezer with AI Home. This refrigerator features a touchscreen display for apps like Spotify and YouTube and voice control via Bixby. It helps reduce food waste and optimize energy usage using its SmartThings app, which helps cut food waste, learns user patterns to optimize energy usage, and integrates with devices like Ring doorbells.

articles.title: ⚡Marvel Teases Tom Holland's Comic-Inspired Black Webbed Suit in ‘Spider-Man: Brand New Day'
articles.summary: Sony Pictures released a teaser video revealing a new Spider-Man suit for the upcoming fourth installment of the movie. The suit is considered to be a new feature within the Spider-Man movie product.

articles.title: MG Cyberster review, first drive
articles.summary: MG launched the Cyberster, a fully imported electric roadster priced at 75 lakh (ex-showroom). The Cyberster has a dual-motor AWD setup producing 510bhp and 725Nm of torque, enabling a 0-100 km/h sprint in 3.2 seconds, with a 77kWh battery pack delivering approximately 350km range. The MG Cyberster is aimed at tech-savvy early adopters.

articles.title: Innov Enterprise Launches Revamped Website Showcasing Custom Apparel, PPE, and Corporate Gifts Solutions
articles.summary: Innov Enterprise Pte Ltd launched its redesigned website on August 2, 2025, featuring Custom Apparel, PPE, and Corporate Gifts solutions. They are also offering a limited-time promotion on custom-printed Dri-Fit T-shirts to celebrate the launch and Singapore's SG60 National Day.

articles.title: Pixel Buds Pro 2 Launch: 'Moonstone' Color Option Available Early
articles.author: Sophie Lin
articles.summary: Google has launched a new 'Moonstone' color option for the Pixel Buds Pro 2, which are already shipping from select retailers. The Pixel Buds Pro 2 also boast improvements such as enhanced noise cancellation, improved transparency mode, spatial audio with head tracking, extended battery life and full EQ customization compared to the Pixel Buds Pro. Pricing remains around $199.99 – $229.99 depending on retailer and promotions.

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy Z Fold 7 and Flip 7: Pre-Orders Surge with Double-Digit Growth
articles.author: Omar El Sayed
articles.summary: Samsung's Galaxy Z Fold 7 and Z Flip 7 foldable smartphones have launched in the US with significant pre-order increases, exceeding last year's figures by over 25%. The Galaxy Z Fold 7 specifically saw a nearly 50% jump in pre-orders due to refined hardware, enhanced software with AI features like Gemini Live and the Now Bar, and a strategic commercial approach including in-store demonstrations and trade-in offers.

articles.title: Will Foldables Be For Everyone? Samsung's JB Park Says Only With Scale
articles.summary: Samsung is focusing on foldable phones like the Galaxy Z Fold and Flip FE, integrating AI for enhanced productivity and camera features. The company aims to make foldables more affordable and improve repairability, with potential self-repair options in the future. At last month's Unpacked event, Samsung launched its latest foldable phones, which it believes are productivity tools in a new AI-powered era.

articles.title: This supermodel took fashion by storm – and turned out to be a total fake
articles.author: David Crowe
articles.summary: Seraphinne Vallora designed an AI model for a Guess campaign. Guess hired the London agency to promote its summer range with the virtual model. Vogue featured the AI-generated person, marking a first for the magazine.

articles.title: 54 Summer-Ready Products Reviewers Say Are 'Wizardry,' 'Sorcery,' Or Just Plain 'Magic'
articles.author: Maitland Quitmeyer
articles.summary: Several new beauty and personal care products are highlighted, including L'Oreal True Match Lumi Glotion for a summery glow, E.l.f. Camo liquid blush, and One/Size's On 'Til Dawn waterproof setting spray. Additionally, the article features the AquaGuard hair cream designed to protect hair from chlorine, SweatBlock antiperspirant wipes designed to reduce excess sweating, and Cosrx SPF 50+ sunscreen.

articles.title: If You're In Your Thirties And Get A Bit Giddy About Saving Money, You'll Love These 43 Things
articles.author: Emma Lord
articles.summary: Several new products are being launched to compete with existing offerings. Pink Stuff's new Sqeezy sponge set is introduced as a solution for tough cleaning projects. Catrice released Instant Awake Under Eye Brightener to conceal dark circles. E.l.f. launched Glow Reviver Melting Lip Balm as alternative to other popular lip balms.

articles.title: AI Takeover: Instagram and Messenger Face Personalized Bots
articles.author: Omar El Sayed
articles.summary: Meta's Instagram and Messenger are deploying AI-powered personalized bots to enhance user experience. These bots offer features like customer support, direct message automation, content discovery, automated reminders, and personalized information delivery, fundamentally altering how users interact with the platforms.

articles.title: Perlis entrepreneurs use TikTok, digital skills learned at Nadi centres to boost sales and reach customers nationwide
articles.summary: Dapur Maksu, selling frozen corn dogs and batter mix, utilized TikTok's 'yellow bag' feature after a Nadi course, resulting in significantly increased sales. Mama Nory cake and bakery enhanced its online marketing through skills learned from Nadi, improving product photos and attracting more customers via Facebook and Instagram.

articles.title: 5 Ridiculously Clever Sex Toys With A Cult-Following
articles.summary: Womanizer is highlighted for its innovative sex toys, including the Enhance 2-in-1 Clitoral Stimulator with Pleasure Air & Vibrations, the Womanizer DUO Dual Clitoral & G-Spot Stimulator, the Womanizer Liberty 2, the Womanizer Blend, and the Womanizer Premium 2, which features quiet motors, waterproof casings, and a unique patented air flow feature. Womanizer offers a 100-day voucher policy for dissatisfied customers.

articles.title: European e-commerce platform lands in the Philippines
articles.author: Jan Milo Severo
articles.summary: Novaluxia has launched its social e-commerce platform in the Philippines, offering high-quality household essentials at fairer prices through a group buying model. The platform is also rolling out the Nova-Barangay Community Co-Creation Plan, collaborating with local communities to extend platform services and empower the grassroots digital economy.

articles.title: Massive price drop on front load washing machines during Amazon Great Freedom Festival Sale 2025
articles.author: Aishwarya Faraswal
articles.summary: Amazon Great Freedom Festival Sale 2025 offers discounts on front load washing machines from brands like LG, Samsung, Godrej, Bosch, IFB and Haier. These washing machines come with features like AI-powered fabric sensing, steam wash, inverter technology, and Wi-Fi control. The sale includes models with warranties and special deals.

articles.title: Turning blog posts into social media carousels
articles.author: Jaspreet Bindra
articles.summary: Claude and Canva have launched a new integration that automates summarization and design processes. This integration, powered by Anthropic's Model Context Protocol (MCP), allows users to create branded visuals using natural language prompts, streamlining content repurposing for platforms like Instagram and LinkedIn, and saving time.

articles.title: Robot disguised as bedside lamp goes viral for folding laundry
articles.author: Vn Express
articles.summary: Stanford researcher Aaron Tan developed Lume, a robotic bedside lamp designed to fold laundry, with a target price under $2,000 and a planned shipping date in 2026, and thousands of preorders have been placed. Brett Adcock, CEO of Figure AI, showcased Figure 02, a humanoid robot performing laundry tasks.

articles.title: The trouble with Agent, ChatGPT's new web-browsing AI
articles.author: Harry McCracken
articles.summary: Perplexity launched Comet, an AI-powered web browser agent, for its premium users. OpenAI introduced Agent, a new ChatGPT agent, while Microsoft is integrating Copilot mode into its Edge browser. Opera is previewing Opera Neon, a browser with built-in AI agentic capabilities, showcasing the trend of integrating AI agents into web browsers.

articles.title: OLIVE YOUNG Brings Leading K-Beauty Brands and "All Live Young" Philosophy to KCON LA 2025 as Title Sponsor
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: OLIVE YOUNG is showcasing 66 brands, including its private label brands BIOHEAL BOH, BRINGGREEN, and COLORGRAM, at KCON LA 2025 with interactive zones. The event also previews OLIVE YOUNG's upcoming U.S. retail launch, highlighting skincare products like essences, serums, sun care, sheet masks, and creams that will likely be included in the store.

articles.title: Save over $800 on an NVIDIA RTX 5070 PC from Lenovo, now under $1,400
articles.author: Rock
articles.summary: Lenovo introduced a 'Doorbuster' deal featuring a new PC. This PC includes the recently released NVIDIA 5070 GPU.

articles.title: Tesco's �7 perfumes 'smell like' luxury Le Labo, Chanel and Tom Ford scents
articles.author: Daily Record
articles.summary: Tesco has introduced a line of bargain perfumes that shoppers are comparing favorably to luxury fragrances, describing them as "lush."

articles.title: Elon Musk launches Grok Imagine: AI video generator now available on waitlist. Here's how to ...
articles.author: The Economic Times
articles.summary: xAI has launched Grok Imagine. Grok Imagine allows users to create AI-generated videos and images from text prompts.

articles.title: Elon Musk launches Grok Imagine: AI video generator now available on waitlist. Here's how to join it
articles.author: The Times
articles.summary: xAI launched Grok Imagine. Grok Imagine allows users to create AI-generated videos and images from text prompts.
